means: 坐立不安，烦躁( fidget的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: A long tale gives a child fidgets.
sentence.Network_cn: 太长的故事会使小孩子烦躁不安.

sentence.Network_en: Observers report that a person usually fidgets before a dream.
sentence.Network_cn: 观察者说人在做梦前通常不安.

sentence.Network_en: I always get the fidgets during long meetings.
sentence.Network_cn: 会议开得长我就坐不住了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The long speech gave him the fidgets ., 冗长的演说使他烦躁不安.

list.abs: Avoid tapping your fingers or fidgeting with a pen ., 避免轻叩手指或心不在焉地玩弄钢笔.
A long tale gives a child fidgets ., 太长的故事会使小孩子烦躁不安.
Observers report that a person usually fidgets before a dream ., 观察者说人在做梦前通常不安.
乱动的英文... ... 不要乱动 ： Keep your hands clear 不要乱动 ： Stop fidgeting 请勿乱动开关 ： Please Don't Touch the Switch.

entry.def: If you fidget, you keep moving your hands or feet slightly or changing your position slightly, for example because you are nervous, bored, or excited.

example.tran: 布伦达在座位上烦躁不安。

entry.def: If you fidget with something, you keep moving it or touching it with your fingers with small movements, for example because you are nervous or bored.

example.ex: The priest fidgeted nervously with his black rosary beads.
example.tran: 牧师紧张地拨弄着他的黑色念珠。

auth_sentence.content: Sedentary weavers of long tales Give me the fidgets.

auth_sentence.content: Valentine Ngema fidgets nervously as he sits behind the wheel of his car.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Valentine Ngema fidgets nervously as he sits behind the wheel of his car.

auth_sentence.content: In Ever Decreasing Circles, a further decade into his TV career, Briers was Martin Bryce, one of life's control-freak fidgets.
auth_sentence.res_content: In Ever Decreasing Circles, a further decade into his TV career, Briers was Martin Bryce, one of life's control-freak fidgets.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In Ever Decreasing Circles, a further decade into his TV career, Briers was Martin Bryce, one of life's control-freak fidgets.
